title: E-Commerce Ad Creative Job Description
job_overview:
We are hiring an E-Commerce Ad Creative for project-based work to join our dropshipping company. You will create and optimize ad creatives for Shopify and paid advertising to drive conversions and align with product descriptions.

Responsibilities


Create and edit product photos and videos for social media, email, and website ads.



Implement direct response marketing strategies to boost sales.



Design visually appealing advertisements for meta.



Stay updated on digital advertising and design trends.



Ensure ads comply with platform regulations.



Collaborate with marketing and product teams to enhance listings.

Qualifications





Proven experience in ad creative production.



Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign), Canva, and AI tools (required).



Strong knowledge of digital marketing principles.



Excellent communication and collaboration skills.



Detail-oriented with a focus on visual aesthetics.



Ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment.



Familiarity with e-commerce and online advertising platforms is a plus.
